name: Take Your Shot
description:
Submission for TrainJam2017

Shootout game on top of a train where you get closer and closer to your enemy until you manage to shoot them, whoever kills the other first wins!!

Game Developed By:

  • Jeremy Spillmann - Design and 2d Art
  • Pamela Figueroa - Design and Code
  • Manuel Saleta - Design and Code
  • Martijn Dijksen - Design and Code
  • Robbie Bangart - Design and 3d Models
  • Elias Farham -- Design, Music, and Sound/sfx

Controls:

1st Player:

  • Aim with the left joystick or wasd
  • shoot with the left trigger or the left ctrl key

2nd Player

  • Aim with the right joystick or the arrow keys
  • Shoot with the right trigger or the left ctrl key
